attributes.action: Keep British Summer Time and do not turn the clocks back to Greenwich mean time.
attributes.additional_details: The cold winter time would be less miserable and of a shorter duration.  This will mean the earliest darkness would be 5.00pm and not 4.00pm.
attributes.background: Keep the time set at British Summer Time (GMT +1) always.  No longer turn the clocks back to Greenwich mean time.  Perhaps re-name this time zone the British Standard Time.
